document_data.caption: A map showing Sniff Alley and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Sniff Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Sniff Alley''' was a small corner alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Sniff Alley was located in the northcentral section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It cut the corner between the [[Street of Glances]] and both [[Gorl Street]] and [[Sighing Maiden's Walk]].
document_data.Description: An entry into the [[Waterdeep/Sewers|Waterdeep sewers]] was found on Sniff Alley beside its lone tree.
document_data.History: The alley was named for a perpetual pile of rotting fishbones that was present until the [[Lords of Waterdeep]] enacted new laws about piling garbage.
